level.text: This section shall apply to each holder of a Manufacturer’s license Class A.
Licensees subject to the section shall, on or before the 21st day of each month, furnish to the Board on a form to be prescribed by the Board a statement under oath showing the following information:
The quantity of each kind of alcoholic beverage, except beer, manufactured by the licensee during the preceding calendar month for beverage purposes; and
The quantity of alcoholic beverages manufactured by the licensee during the preceding calendar month for nonbeverage purposes.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 4309 (April 30, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008).
